Products derived from this software may not be called "PHP", nor may "PHP" appear in their name,
without prior written permission from group@php.net. You may indicate that your software works

The PHP Group may publish revised and/or new versions of the license from time to time. Each

Redistributions of any form whatsoever must retain the following acknowledgment: "This product

This software consists of voluntary contributions made by many individuals on behalf of the PHP Group.
The PHP Group can be contacted via Email at group@php.net.
For more information on the PHP Group and the PHP project, please see <http://www.php.net>.
PHP includes the Zend Engine, freely available at <http://www.zend.com>.
